attributes.action: Make it a criminal offence for MPs to knowingly  lie and be dishonest
attributes.additional_details: We wouldn't be facing a hugely damaging Brexit and very likely the break up of what is the UK.  I'm fed up with seeing MPs etc lying whether it be in PMQs, in Parliament (Michael Gove being an example when talking about security post brexit)
attributes.background: We're in the mess we're in now due to the dishonesty of our Government and those who were involved in the Vote Leave Campaign.  The PM tells one lie after the next and walks away scot free.  In a normal work place he'd be fired for dishonesty.  Why should it be one rule for them another for us?

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/561730
